data.title: About LAMA2
data.text: This is an enhanced version of the original project LAMA incorporating new features and technologies like TypeScript, Redux, AI-powered note generation, drag-and-drop functionality and much more. The project is open source and available on GitHub.

data.title: What's new @ v0.2.0
list: Added dialog when clicking a note
Note title and text can be modified
New note options and input refactored
